title: game crashing when trying purchasing rp on mac
body: cant purchase any rp, when ever i go in the store and click on purchase rp, it crashes and refreshes. KInda gets stuck in the same cycle. Tried restarting comp and all. Only started happening after the current patch on macbook, Anyone else with this issue?

replies.body:
Hi Everyone, thanks for reporting this.

As of now, engineers are already aware and working on next steps to resolve this issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=JZ5Ec0aO,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-11-21T02:25:32.939+0000)
>
> Hi Everyone, thanks for reporting this.
> 
> As of now, engineers are already aware and working on next steps to resolve this issue.

Do they have an estimated guess as to when the issue will be resolved?
We're aiming for the fix to roll out Tuesday morning AEDT.
Hello. The issue is still happening after the update. Is there another way that mac users can buy RP?

Yea, looks like I jumped the gun saying Tuesday morning to get the fix out. I swear every time I give a date for something to happen I'm wrong in the end - when will I learn to just use good old Soon™? Sorry about the false hope D:
It looked like we were seriously close to shipping a fix but apparently that wasn't the case. I'm asking around for an update on this now.
UPDATE: Latest info is that this fix has had to be pushed to 8.24. If there are items you want to buy or sales you want to take advantage of that expire before you're next able to purchase RP due to this issue, then please take note of those items now and [send a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Player Support after the patch. They should help by manually purchasing those items for you.

Also if you have any prepaid RP cards that you can't redeem due to this issue, Player Support will help you manually redeem right now.
I really hope we can send in ticket to get the pj skins afterwards :( been wanting to for weeks now, and will be super sad if I dont get them.

>UPDATE: Latest info is that this fix has had to be pushed to 8.24. If there are items you want to buy or sales you want to take advantage of that expire before you're next able to purchase RP due to this issue, then please take note of those items now and send a ticket to Player Support after the patch. They should help by manually purchasing those items for you.

>Also if you have any prepaid RP cards that you can't redeem due to this issue, Player Support will help you manually redeem right now.

How will the player support help?
what the email
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
And when will Patch 8.24 be released? I really want to be able to buy stuff for the winter events coming up.
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
Is there an update on this? This issue is still going on.
Still nothing. The client crashes.

Tuesday the 27th of November 2018. bug is still happening to me. I purchased gift cards and wanted to redeem codes and the client crashed. wanted to purchase rp and the client crashes. just wanted to buy DJ-Sona for my girlfriend
Same. Maybe cuz I have updated my mac os to mac os mojave? WIs this a possible reason?

Here's the translation (ur language make me mad but sure)

[REMOVED] (weird phrase, Chinese friend helped me so?

lol sry bro I thought no one would look at the comments so seriously but I do pretty mad cuz tomorrow is my friends birthday I promised him an eclipse Leona mega bundle but now I have to change my plan.
Same here, it’s really frustrating because I just want to gift skins to friends but I can’t

Same here xD
That should a top priority!. We say "Take our money" and they - "Nope" xD
This is a known issue for those playing on macs at the moment. It's being worked on so hang tight :)
Same here. Can’t buy any RP. And I’m 1 gemstone away from 10.... UGH
Me too
Same issue for me :/

Same problem. 
Everything else in the store/client is fine. It only crashes when trying to purchase the RP.
Same issue, tryna buy RP come on rito...
Same problem!
Here, just reopen and reopen again, I cant purchase rp neither.
Hello, I wanted to try getting myself some riot points because that one skin I've wanted is on sale, but now Im getting this bug as well (macbook air)

Hi, this issue has just happened to me on my MacBook Air. I haven't tried to purchase RP for the duration of owning my MacBook, but I wanted to purchase a skin in my mystery skin loot thing but I can't purchase RP!!. This is really annoying as I really want to take advantage of this sale. 

Pls Help!
Any idea when u guys are gonna fix this?
Still crashing when purchasing and still CANNOT MINIMIZE the client...
this happens for me aswell, when i click purchase rp the it keeps crashing and puts on a loading circle. hope this gets fixed, i wanna buy RP :(
same  !!!!!!!!!!{{summoner:4}}

> [{quoted}](name=ni55a,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=JZ5Ec0aO,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-11-20T09:40:25.554+0000)
>
> cant purchase any rp, when ever i go in the store and click on purchase rp, it crashes and refreshes. KInda gets stuck in the same cycle. Tried restarting comp and all. Only started happening after the current patch on macbook, Anyone else with this issue?

Yeah it is right when I click purchase RP or try to gift RP to someone.
I just want solar eclipse leona...

I too am having the same problem, and it’s because one of the updates for Mac made league of legends incompatible for the device. There is no way to repair that until the engineers of league of legends make it compatible, so just hang on. Also, please reply if you had a warning, because I did.
Still not working. Pls fix. I can't even redeem gift cards.
Still crashing on the purchase button and the redeem one... Any Idea of an ETA?
Same...
Any update on this?
same problem, will try again tomorrow, thanks
Any update on this? Just trying to buy a skin ):
Any update on this?

> [{quoted}](name=ni55a,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=JZ5Ec0aO,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-11-20T09:40:25.554+0000)
>
> cant purchase any rp, when ever i go in the store and click on purchase rp, it crashes and refreshes. KInda gets stuck in the same cycle. Tried restarting comp and all. Only started happening after the current patch on macbook, Anyone else with this issue?

Just an update, not sure how helpful this is though, I remembered i have both mac os and windows 10 installed on my laptop through boot camp, so when i need to purchase rp I restart to windows and then switch back over when playing.

I know it helps very little to say I am having the same problem, and I've done software management before and such, and it is really irritating to get nagging consumers, but I would be truly disappointed if I were unable to purchase the pajama guardian skin add-on thing because of this. Thanks for what you do guys.
same here
